duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain actuarial models and tools for risk analysis, planning, and reporting.
Interact with other risk functions to provide technical support, analysis, and risk reporting.
Support the US and Latin America risk reporting process by mastering risk and actuarial software models.
Modify and maintain actuarial models and data analytics used to support risk analysis and planning.
Document work appropriately to ensure replication and perform technical reviews as assigned.
Summarize and communicate findings and results with clear and understandable messaging.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Math, Finance, Actuarial Sciences, Statistics or related field (ASA accreditation required).
